attributes.action: Government must accept no further delays to the proposed 2026 local elections.
attributes.additional_details: It would be a clear affront to democracy to deny people their right to vote.
attributes.background: The Government must delay no further than the already delayed local elections planned for 2026. We do not accept that a further delay is in any way democratic.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for similar action: "Remove power to cancel local government elections" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/747234
